summary: This mod simply makes Hulda in Bannered Mare look better.
descriptionHtml:
WARNING!
This is my first uploaded mod, and it may have some problems. If you try it out and encounter any problems, feel free to report the problem.
Also, I am not native English speaker, so beware, my English is not perfect.

Reasons this mod exists:
So, you have installed a mod that makes faces look nicer, but some faces just got worse?
Well, in my case, every mod that makes female faces better (Women of Skyrim, Better Females by Bella etc.) also makes Hulda in Whiterun look... Well, not so good.
That is why I created this mod.

What it does:
Only replaces Hulda's face, nothing else.
If it does something else, however, please let me know.

Requirements:
Does not require other mods.

Installing:
Manually: Paste the "HuldaFacelift_v001.esp" in your "Skyrim/Data" -folder.
Nexus Mod Manager: Not possible yet, working on it :/

Uninstalling:
Manually: Delete the "HuldaFacelift_v001.esp" from your "Skyrim/Data" -folder.
author: HowToModItWrong
